response.original_title: Nick Mason's Saucerful Of Secrets: Live At Pompeii
response.overview: 52 years after the original Pompeii film, Nick Mason, the legendary drummer of Pink Floyd, returns to this iconic location with his new band for an unforgettable performance.  Intro - Pre-Show - One Of These Days - Nick Mason Speech 1 (Hat, Honorary Citizenship) - Arnold Layne - Fearless - Obscured By Clouds - When You're In - Candy And A Currant Bun - Vegetable Man - Nick Mason Speech 2 (Banned by the BBC) - If - Atom Heart Mother - If (Reprise) - Guy Pratt Speech 1 (Richard Wright Tribute) - Remember A Day - Nick Mason Speech 3 (Band Introduction) - Set The Controls for The Heart Of The Sun - Interval (Nick's Honorary Citizenship Ceremony) - Astronomy Domine - The Nile Song - Guy Pratt speech 2 (Exclusive club) - Burning Bridges - Childhood's End -  Lucifer Sam - Echoes - See Emily Play - A Saucerful Of Secrets - Bike - Band Says Goodbye - Ending
response.title: Nick Mason's Saucerful Of Secrets: Live At Pompeii
